event.title: Open Source Friday stream: GitHub Copilot in the CLI
event.metaDesc: Join us for Open Source Friday
event.content:
Join GitHub for Open Source Friday: a weekly celebration of open source projects, brought to you by the folks building them. 
May 31st weâ€™ll host an exciting live event with GitHub's Andy Feller! Andy will be showcasing the power of Copilot in the command line interface (CLI) and exploring the capabilities of GitHub CLI. ðŸ’»
[Sign up on Meetup](https://www.meetup.com/github/) for a reminder, and tune in on [Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/github).
